lines: phyogs dus kun nas skyabs gsum bka' sdod bcas
nyon mongs 'gro la mkhyen brtses rab dgongs nas
dpag med zhing nas thogs med med rdzu 'phrul gyis

dkon cog gsum dngos gnas brtan bcu drug gis

phyogs dus kun nas skyabs gsum bka' sdod bcas
nyon mongs 'gro la mkhyen brtses rab dgongs nas
dpag med zhing nas thogs med rdzu 'phrul gyis
'dir gshegs mchod sprin rgya mtsho'i dbus bzhugs gsol
lag mthil ltar mnyam rin cen rgyan gyis spras
ljon shing chu mtshos brgyan pa'i sa gzhi'i dbus
rin cen las grub gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa
padma nyi zlas brgyan pa'i gdan steng du
thugs rjes rtsod pa'i dus kyi gdul bya rnams
rnam grol lam la 'god mdzad 'gro ba'i mgon
thub pa mchog dang gnas brtan bcu drug po
dam bcas thugs rje'i dbang gis gnas 'dir gshegs
phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas thams cad dang
shes rab me 'bar nyon mongs mtsho skem zhing
rnam grol bsod nams zhing du bkas bstod pa'i
phyogs bcu'i nyan thos dge 'dun bzhugs su 'tshal
yon 'byor mchod pa'i gnas su spyan 'dren na
'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol
'gro ba'i mgon po shAkya seng ge yis
sangs rgyas bstan pa gang gi phyag tu bzhag
gsung rab rin cen sgrom gyi kha 'byed pa'i
chos skyong dgra bcom chen po bzhugs su 'tshal
dam chos spel ba'i slad du spyan 'dren gyis
'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol
thub pas bka' bsgos bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin
yan lag 'byung dang ma pham nags na gnas
dus ldan rdo rje mo'i bu bzang po dang
gser be'u b+ha ra d+h+wa dza gser can mchog
'phags pa ba ku la dang sgra gcan 'dzin
lam phran b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len
lam brtan glu'i sde sbed byed mi phyed pa
'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol
spangs dang ye shes phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyang
gdul bya'i don du nyan thos tshul 'dzin pa
khyad par can gyi 'phrin las chos skyong ba'i
gnas brtan 'khor bcas 'dir byon gdan la bzhugs
bde gshegs bka' lung gtsor mdzad bstan pa bsrung
rang don dor nas 'khor ba'i nags tshal du
gzhan don lhur mdzad gnas brtan bcu drug po
dam bcas thugs rje'i dbang gis gnas 'dir gshegs
dge bsnyen skyabs gsol bden pa'i tshig nyan pa
dkon cog gsum gyi zhabs 'bring mchis so 'tshal
bsod nams rin cen gling du spyan 'dren na
'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol
bcom ldan 'dir ni byon pa legs
bdag cag bsod nams skal bar ldan
ji srid mchod pa bdag bgyid na
de srid bcom ldan bzhugs su gsol
gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid

bla ma rin cen lta bu'i sku
rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud

'khor tshogs srid mtsho las brgal nyon mongs med
khri dang drug stong bzhi brgya'i tshogs rnams kyis
bstan pa yun ring gnas par byin gyis rlobs
bdag gzhan dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus
phan bde'i 'byung gnas bstan pa 'phel gyur cig
sdug bsngal kun 'byung ma lus rab spangs nas
srid pa'i rgya mtsho myur du skem par shog
ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par dag gyur te
yon tan rgya mtsho ma lus kun rdzogs nas
'jig rten kun las khyad par 'phags par shog
tshogs gnyis mthar phyin dus gsum rgyal ba yi
'phrin las sgrub cing yon tan rnams dbyer med
skal ba mnyam pa'i gdul bya smin mdzad pa
mnyam med bla ma mchog gi bkra shis shog
dus gsum rgyal ba rgyal sras thugs rje yis
nyan thos tshul 'dzin srid pa ji srid par
bstan pa skyong zhing 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i
gnas brtan chen po rnams kyi bkra shis shog
